name: Class SynthEditorPaneUI
text:
Provides the Synth L&F UI delegate for
 JEditorPane.
codes:
public class SynthEditorPaneUI
extends BasicEditorPaneUI
implements SynthUI

methods.description: Creates a new UI object for the given component.

This method gets called when a bound property is changed
 on the associated JTextComponent.  This is a hook
 which UI implementations may change to reflect how the
 UI displays bound properties of JTextComponent subclasses.
 This is implemented to rebuild the ActionMap based upon an
 EditorKit change.

methods.method_sig:
public void update (Graphics g,
                   JComponent c)
methods.description:
Notifies this UI delegate to repaint the specified component.
 This method paints the component background, then calls
 the paint(SynthContext,Graphics) method.

 In general, this method does not need to be overridden by subclasses.
 All Look and Feel rendering code should reside in the paint method.

methods.method_sig:
protected void paint (SynthContext context,
                     Graphics g)
